title: Project for Developing Student Engagement Strategies in Online Accounting Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Accounting Concepts and Fundamental Technical Skills for Educational Settings
context.additional_context: Designed to Strengthen Accounting Education Design Competencies for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers, with Project Tasks Optimized for Smartphone-Based Learning Activities

learning_goals: Learners can design online accounting education modules utilizing synchronous/asynchronous channels.
Learners develop at least three PBL tasks that promote learner engagement in limited technological environments.
Learners can improve online education strategies based on learner feedback analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
